title: Ergodyne Standard Rib Knit Beanie, Black, One Size
features: 100% acrylic, stretchable rib-knit fabric for a snug fit
A classic beanie to keep your noggin' warm, cozy and stylish
Suitable for all seasons: Spring / Summer / Autumn / Winter
One Size Fits Most: Our premium, soft acrylic stretches to fit all heads, even Einstein-sized ones
description: The N-Ferno 6812 Rib Knit Beanie is a cool weather essential featuring stretchable ribbed knit fabric that fits snug to keep heat close when the temperature drops. It's the perfect knit hat to comfortably layer underneath a helmet or a hood for cool-to-cold conditions. The lightweight thermal cap comes in our favorite shades of hi-vis lime, hi-vis orange and classic black. Be ready for any outdoor excursion with this classic knit cap sized to fit most noggins small and large. It measures 9.25 inches high by 8.5 inches wide and is machine washable. Wear this stylish beanie as a year-round accessory with comfort you can count on and a classic look for all seasons. Whether you're hitting the mountain, shoveling your driveway or working in cold climates.
